Verifying your Insurance is easy!

We are happy to help setup detox too!

Verify your insurance below

Peaks Recover Centers are drug and alcohol addiction treatment providers in Colorado and work with most PPO insurance plans that have out-of-network benefits. Please submit your insurance information below and a representative from our program will promptly contact you with your insurance benefits. If you are interested in cash payment options, please contact our admission line directly at (888) 506-9818.

For United Health Care/ Optum insurance policies, the patient must first call their insurance provider and authorize either Triple Peaks Recovery or Serenity Peaks Recovery to verify your benefits. If a reference number is given, please place that number in the comments section.

We are not a Medicaid or Medicare provider. Please Click Here for a list of Medicaid providers in the state of Colorado.

A Caring Recovery

A Caring Recovery for Young Adults

Get Help Today: (888) 506-9818

Everyday millions of individuals and their families are affected by substance use disorder. Studies show that the longer young adults participate in treatment programs and stay active in their recovery, the more likely it is that they will achieve long-term sobriety and stability. We believe it paramount to the long-term success of young adults and their recovery that they continue with extended care treatment. Our client’s personal growth and recovery from alcohol and substance abuse is our highest priority. It’s why we do what we do. At Triple Peaks and Serenity Peaks we value how special your loved one is and we are committed to their long-term recovery and personal growth.

Contact Peaks Recovery
